title: Rice and Plantain
instructions:
Instructions

What to do with the stuff to be making the meal, the meal being of course Jollof rice and plantain.
ingredients:
Stuff to go into the making

A set of stuff what goes in to make said meal, said meal being Jollof rice and plantain.
about:
Fried Plantain can be eaten in a variety of ways. It will often come to the rescue when you need a fast and easy meal. A popular side dish to many of the rice recipes and can be enjoyed by people from all over the world.
Low in fat and super delicious.
strapline: Fried Plantain is one of the easy and fast recipes, often featured in Nigerian breakfast meals.
